summary: TRANSMISSION LOCKED UP AND WENT OUT ON MY DODGE CARAVAN.  WE WILL NEED TO HAVE THE TRANSMISSION REPLACED IN ORDER TO CONTINUE TO DRIVE THIS VEHICLE.  LUCKILY WE WERE ABLE TO PULL OVER FOR SAFETY ON A MAJOR HIGHWAY.  WE ALWAYS PAY ATTENTION TO THE UPKEEP OF OUR VEHICLES AND SERVICE THEM REGULARLY.
